summary: Discover the home of the ancient Nord, Saldat, and read his journals to discover about him.
descriptionHtml: Sladat was an ancient Nord warrior with two brothers. Since they were younglings the three of them tried to join the companions. One day they succeed and even may to the circle, where Saldat`s brothers betray him and get him banished from the Whiterun hold. There is an invitation in Breezehome in Whiterun explaining that he does not wish for his life`s work to be wasted and is awaiting a worthy fighter to take his place.
author: King Of Doom Junior
